episodes.title: The Pilot
episodes.description: Monica and the gang introduce Rachel to the "real world" after she leaves her fianc√© at the altar. Ross struggles with his rediscovered feelings for Rachel.

episodes.title: The One With The Sonogram At The End
episodes.description: Ross finds out his estranged lesbian wife and her life partner are going to have his baby.

episodes.title: The One With The Thumb
episodes.description: Phoebe discovers a human thumb floating in her can of soda and gets compensation of $7,000. Chandler starts smoking again.

episodes.title: The One With George Stephanopoulos
episodes.description: The girls spy on the sexy politician across the street, while the guys go to a hockey game.

episodes.title: The One With The East German Laundry Detergent
episodes.description: Ross and Rachel wash their laundry together. Joey takes Monica on a fake double date in an attempt to reunite with his ex

episodes.title: The One With The Butt
episodes.description: Joey finally gets a film role: Al Pacino's butt double. Chandler dates a woman who already has both a husband and a boyfriend.

episodes.title: The One With The Blackout
episodes.description: During a power outage, Rachel falls for the owner of a lost kitten, a Italian guy, much to Ross's chagrin. Meanwhile, Chandler is trapped in an automated-teller vestibule with a gorgeous model.

episodes.title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
episodes.description: Ross and Monica go to the bedside of their dead grandmother, who momentarily returns to life. Chandler questions his sexual persona when a collegue wants to arrange a date for him with another guy.

episodes.title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
episodes.description: Monica plans a lovely, quiet Thanksgiving feast in her apartment but her plans go awry. Joey appears on medical posters. Rachel plans to go skiing with her family.

episodes.title: The One With The Monkey
episodes.description: Ross arrives at the New Year's Eve party with his new companion, a monkey named Marcel, who is more compatible with the group than he is.

episodes.title: The One With Mrs. Bing
episodes.description: Chandler's flamboyant romance-novelist mother comes to New York for a visit. Monica and Phoebe cause a traffic accident.

episodes.title: The One With The Dozen Lasagnas
episodes.description: Rachel's Italian boyfriend Paolo hits on Phoebe in the massage parlor.

episodes.title: The One With The Boobies
episodes.description: Chandler sees Rachel naked. Joey learns that his father is having an affair with a pet mortician, but his mother already knew.

episodes.title: The One With The Candy Hearts
episodes.description: The girls rebel against Valentine's Day by burning mementos from past relationships. Chandler reunites with an old flame.

episodes.title: The One With The Stoned Guy
episodes.description: Ross asks Joey for advice on how to talk dirty to women. Monica interviews for a chef's position, but the owner shows up stoned.

episodes.title: The One With Two Parts, Part 1
episodes.description: Phoebe's twin sister causes confusion and conflict when Joey is attracted to her.

episodes.title: The One With Two Parts, Part 2
episodes.description: Monica and Rachel squabble over two handsome doctors.

episodes.title: The One With All The Poker
episodes.description: The girls lose money in a poker game with the boys. After getting advice from Monica's aunt, they demand a rematch.

episodes.title: The One Where The Monkey Gets Away
episodes.description: Rachel accidentally lets Ross's pet monkey escape and a search party forms. Then she discovers that her old best friend Mindy is engaged to marry her ex-fiance.

episodes.title: The One With The Evil Orthodontist
episodes.description: Rachel has a brief encounter with her ex-fiance. Riddled with guilt, she decides to confess her evil sins only to discover that Mindy's been busier than she's let on.

episodes.title: The One With The Fake Monica
episodes.description: Monica meets her identity thief, who helps her live out her fantasies. Ross's monkey becomes sexually mature and drives everyone crazy.

episodes.title: The One With The Ick Factor
episodes.description: Monica discovers that she is a cradle snatcher. Ross's ex-wife begins giving birth.

episodes.title: The One With The Birth
episodes.description: The baby is born, bringing adoration from everyone.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
episodes.description: Rachel finds out about Ross's love for her while he is working in China. However, another surprise awaits her as she heads to the airport to meet him.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' New Girlfriend
episodes.description: Rachel gets an unpleasant surprise when Ross returns home. Phoebe has varied success when cutting her friends' hair!

episodes.title: The One With The Breast Milk
episodes.description: Monica goes shopping when Ross's new girlfriend and is too afraid to tell Rachel. Joey is troubled when a fellow after-shave salesman outperforms him on the job.

episodes.title: The One Where Heckles Dies
episodes.description: The downstairs neighbor dies and bequeaths his strange possessions to Monica and Rachel.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Husband
episodes.description: Everyone's surprised when Phoebe's husband shows up.

episodes.title: The One With Five Steaks And An Eggplant
episodes.description: When planning a birthday party for Ross, the six discover money is an issue in life, even among friends.

episodes.title: The One With The Baby On The Bus
episodes.description: Joey and Chandler accidentally leave Ben on a bus while babysitting. Phoebe (whose Smelly Cat debuts here) gets fired from her Central Perk singing gig, and is replaced by a professional.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
episodes.description: Dramatic developments occur in Ross and Rachel's relationship. Chandler regrets asking Monica to help him lose weight.

episodes.title: The One With The List
episodes.description: Rachel makes a painful discovery concerning Ross. Monica's new boss gives her an impossible task.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Dad
episodes.description: Phoebe learns the surprising truth about her father. Ross makes Monica's Christmas party guests miserable. Rachel gets her revenge on Ross.

episodes.title: The One With Russ
episodes.description: After some gentle person persuasion, Joey accepts a great acting job. Rachel dates a guy who looks amazingly like Ross.

episodes.title: The One With The Lesbian Wedding
episodes.description: Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding with help from an uncomfortable Ross.

episodes.title: The One After The Superbowl, Part 1
episodes.description: Ross goes to visit Marcel the Monkey in the San Diego Zoo and finds the simian is pursuing a show-biz career. Joey has a date with a deranged fan. Lembeck won a Best Director Emmy.

episodes.title: The One After The Superbowl, Part 2
episodes.description: Rachel and Monica fight over Jean-Claude Van Damme. Chandler dates a girl he went to elementary school with, with a surprising outcome. Lembeck won a Best Director Emmy.

episodes.title: The One With The Prom Video
episodes.description: Monica's old home video elicits the true feelings Ross has for Rachel. Joey gives Chandler a gift.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross And Rachel... You Know
episodes.description: Ross and Rachel encounter romantic obstacles. Monica falls for a handsome older doctor. Chandler and Joey have new lazy chairs and do not want to get up from them.

episodes.title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
episodes.description: Chandler catches Joey licking a spoon and replacing it in the drawer, and a major fight ensues. Monica's parents find out about her new boyfriend.

episodes.title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
episodes.description: Joey and Chandler pine for each other but neither will admit it. Chandler gets a new roommate. A record company asks Phoebe to make a Smelly Cat music video.

episodes.title: The One Where Dr. Ramoray Dies
episodes.description: Joey's soap character looks set to be killed off after Joey makes some contentious remarks to a fan magazine. Monica and Richard have their first argument.

episodes.title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go
episodes.description: Chandler battles to get rid of his annoying new roommate and have Joey, who's feeling the crunch of unemployment and mounting debt, move back in. The girls discover a book on personal empowerment.

episodes.title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies
episodes.description: Impressionable Phoebe becomes depressed when it dawns on her that some movies don't end happily. Richard bonds with Chandler and Joey at a basketball game.

episodes.title: The One With The Bullies
episodes.description: Chandler and Ross are intimidated by two bullies who take over the friends' Central Perk sofa. Phoebe meets her long-lost family.

episodes.title: The One With Two Parties
episodes.description: Rachel gets a real surprise when her parents show up at her birthday party.

episodes.title: The One With The Chicken Pox
episodes.description: When Phoebe catches chicken pox, her chances for romance with an ex-love are nearly ruined. Rachel is intrigued by Phoebe's ex-love sailor suit wanting Ross to have one as well. Monica feels she may be too neurotic for straight-arrow Richard.

episodes.title: The One With Barry & Mindy's Wedding
episodes.description: Rachel is a bridesmaid at her ex-fiance's wedding. Monica and Richard's relationship is jeopardized when the subject of children arises.

episodes.title: The One With The Princess Leia Fantasy
episodes.description: Ross's secret fantasy doesn't stay secret for long after he confides in Rachel. Chandler begins to rekindle his relationship with ex-girlfriend Janice.

episodes.title: The One Where No One's Ready
episodes.description: Ross gets riled when his friends fail to be ready on time for a museum fundraiser where he's giving a speech.

episodes.title: The One With The Jam
episodes.description: Monica becomes obsessed with making jam as a means of getting over Richard. Still feeling unfulfilled, she decides she wants to having a baby and visits a sperm bank.

episodes.title: The One With The Metaphorical Tunnel
episodes.description: Ross and Rachel encourage Chandler to "go through the tunnel" and commit to Janice. Ross worries when his son plays with a girl's doll and tries frantically to substitute masculine toys.

episodes.title: The One With Frank Jr.
episodes.description: Phoebe invited her half-brother Frank Jr. to visit. Ross makes a list of famous women he'd like to date.

episodes.title: The One With The Flashback
episodes.description: After Janice asks whether they've ever dated each other, the friends reminisce about a time three years ago and some dark secrets are revealed.

episodes.title: The One With The Race Car Bed
episodes.description: When returning a misdelivered bed back to the store, Monica and Joey catch Janice passionately kissing her ex-husband in the back room.

episodes.title: The One With The Giant Poking Device
episodes.description: When Phoebe believes she's killed the ugly naked guy across the street from Rachel and Monica, Joey constructs a long poking device. Chandler confronts Janice.

episodes.title: The One With The Football
episodes.description: It's Thanksgiving and the friends start a game of football that reveals some major rivalries and prods a rematch that has serious implications for the roast turkey!

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Quits
episodes.description: After quitting her Central Perk gig, Rachel worries she'll be jobless long-term. Joey's job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, who becomes distressed over leftover trees.

episodes.title: The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister
episodes.description: A handsome stranger offers Rachel a fashion-buying job. Chandler forgets which of Joey's sisters he fooled around with after getting drunk at Joey's birthday.

episodes.title: The One With All The Jealousy
episodes.description: Ross becomes obsessively jealous of Rachel's sexy new co-worker Mark and is convinced he is flirting with Rachel. Monica is smitten with a sexy busboy.

episodes.title: The One Where Monica & Richard Are Friends
episodes.description: Monica and ex-boyfriend Richard meet by chance - and the lunch they go to leads to something more.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Ex-Partner
episodes.description: Phoebe's ex-singing partner Leslie wants to use Smelly Cat for a cat-litter ad. Chandler dates a beautiful woman with an artificial leg... and a tie to Joey.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross & Rachel Take A Break
episodes.description: Ross and Rachel decide to go on a break. Phoebe becomes involved with a foreign diplomat.

episodes.title: The One With The Morning After
episodes.description: Unaware of Ross's one-night stand with another woman, Rachel visits him to declare her undying love.

episodes.title: The One Without The Ski Trip
episodes.description: Rachel asks everyone to go on a ski trip... except Ross. Chandler is particularly traumatized by the Ross/Rachel breakup, which reminds him of his parents' divorce.

episodes.title: The One With The Hypnosis Tape
episodes.description: Chandler uses a hypnosis tape to quit smoking. Unbeknownst to him, it's aimed only at women. Phoebe freaks when her brother wants to wed a woman twice his age.

episodes.title: The One With The Tiny T-Shirt
episodes.description: Ross is upset when Rachel returns his belongings. Monica dates a millionaire she considers funny, nice and yet not quite her dream man.

episodes.title: The One With The Dollhouse
episodes.description: Monica inherits an exquisite dollhouse from her aunt. Joey winds up in bed with his leading lady. Rachel's boss dates Chandler.

episodes.title: The One With A Chick And A Duck
episodes.description: Monica is ecstatic when her millionaire friend Pete buys a restaurant and wants her as head chef. Joey buys Chandler a chick - a live baby chicken and later a live duck.

episodes.title: The One With The Screamer
episodes.description: Joey's play gets terrible reviews. Ross tries to convince Rachel her date is psychotic.

episodes.title: The One With Ross's Thing
episodes.description: Ross discovers a strange growth on his buttocks. Phoebe dates a firefighter and a teacher.

episodes.title: The One With The Ultimate Fighting Champion
episodes.description: Monica begs Pete to stop fighting after he is beaten up. Chandler is unnerved when his boss slaps his butt. Ross starts dating a new woman.

episodes.title: The One At The Beach
episodes.description: Phoebe invites the group to her client's beach house. Rachel tricks Ross's new girlfriend into shaving her head.

episodes.title: The One With The Jellyfish
episodes.description: Ross falls asleep while reading Rachel's 18-page letter. When confronted by her, he pretends to agree with what she wrote. Monica gets stung by a jellyfish and must resort to drastic measures.

episodes.title: The One With The Cat
episodes.description: Phoebe believes her adoptive mother's spirit inhabits a stray cat. Joey finds the experience of selling his entertainment center not entertaining at all. Monica finally gets to date the big man on her high school campus.

episodes.title: The One With The Cuffs
episodes.description: Monica "pulls a Monica" when she caters her mother's party. Chandler gets himself locked into a compromising position with Rachel's boss.

episodes.title: The One With The Ballroom Dancing
episodes.description: The girls get an eviction notice and Joey comes to their rescue by agreeing to give the building superintendent dancing lessons.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's New Girlfriend
episodes.description: Ross and Rachel continue their power games to make each other jealous. Chandler falls hard for Joey's new girlfriend Kathy.

episodes.title: The One With The Dirty Girl
episodes.description: Ross's beautiful new girlfriend has a disgusting secret. Chandler gets closer to Kathy and buys her a pricey birthday gift. Rachel proudly completes a crossword puzzle without help.

episodes.title: The One Where Chandler Crosses The Line
episodes.description: Chandler kisses Kathy after thinking Joey has lost interest in her. Encouraged by an awed Phoebe, Ross debuts his keyboard "sound" in public.

episodes.title: The One With Chandler In A Box
episodes.description: Still angry over the Kathy kiss, Joey punishes Chandler by shutting him in a box on Thanksgiving. Monica gets a surprise when she visits the eye doctor.

episodes.title: The One Where They're Going To Party
episodes.description: When the guys try to be wild and crazy, they reluctantly realize they'd rather act like adults. Monica writes a scathing restaurant review - and gets a job offer as a result.

episodes.title: The One With The Girl From Poughkeepsie
episodes.description: Ross debates whether to date a faraway beauty or a less desirable woman who lives nearby. Chandler tries to set up a date for Rachel with some co-workers.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Uterus
episodes.description: Phoebe's half-brother Frank Jr. returns with exciting news - and asks a huge favor of Phoebe. Ross gets Joey a job as a museum tour guide.

episodes.title: The One With The Embryos
episodes.description: Phoebe's uterus is put to the ultimate test. A seemingly harmless game between the guys and the girls escalates into a full-blown contest to see which pair knows more personal data about the other.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Crush
episodes.description: Rachel schemes to get a handsome client to ask her on a date. Chandler's jealousy causes problems with his girlfriend.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Dirty Day
episodes.description: On Joey's first day on a major movie, one of Hollywood's legendary stars finds him in a compromising position in his trailer. Rachel regrets asking Ross for a favor when it sparks a new romance.

episodes.title: The One With All The Rugby
episodes.description: Chandler's abrasive ex-girlfriend Janice reappears. Monica finds a mysterious switch in Joey and Chandler's old apartment. Ross tries to impress Emily by playing rugby.

episodes.title: The One With The Fake Party
episodes.description: To become better acquainted with her crush Joshua, Rachel inadvertently thwarts Ross's plans. Phoebe's pregnancy cravings evoke a sympathetic response from Joey.

episodes.title: The One With The Free Porn
episodes.description: Chandler and Joey are glued to their TV after discovering an unscrambled adult cable channel. Monica helps Ross tell his girlfriend he loves her. Phoebe gets some surprising pregnancy news.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's New Dress
episodes.description: Rachel takes a provocative pose to get Joshua into a romantic mood - but her plans go awry. Chandler and Joey are at odds to persuade Phoebe to name one of her triplets after them.

episodes.title: The One With All The Haste
episodes.description: Drastic developments blight Ross's relationship with Emily. Monica and Rachel try to win back their old apartment, much to Chandler and Joey's delight.

episodes.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses
episodes.description: Distraught over Ross's engagement, Rachel takes Joshua aside and suggests they also get married. Chandler forces Joey to go to a sleep clinic to stop his loud snoring. Monica and Phoebe get obsessed to wedding dresses after trying on Emily's wedding dress.

episodes.title: The One With The Invitation
episodes.description: Rachel and Ross each reminisce about when they used to date each other. Everyone is disappointed when Rachel decides not to attend the wedding in England.

episodes.title: The One With The Worst Best Man Ever
episodes.description: When Joey's duck swallows Ross' wedding ring, he is worried he'll have to sacrifice his beloved fowl to retrieve it.

episodes.title: The One With Ross's Wedding, Part 1
episodes.description: Ross tries to encourage Rachel to come to his wedding. Arriving in London, Joey and Chandler go sightseeing but Joey's overly enthusiastic behavior compels Chandler to go off on his own.

episodes.title: The One With Ross's Wedding, Part 2
episodes.description: Back in New York, Rachel realizes her feelings for Ross are stronger than ever and rushes off to the airport as wedding time nears. After a drunken guest mistakes Monica for Ross's mother, She and Chandler console each other and start their romantic journey.

episodes.title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
episodes.description: Ross's nuptials continue after his slip-of-the-tongue but wedded bliss doesn't follow. Monica and Chandler try continuing their affair but can't steal a moment alone.

episodes.title: The One With All The Kissing
episodes.description: Ross's attempts at reconciling with Emily go unheeded. Chandler and Monica's affair is challenged by their "Not-in-New York" rule.

episodes.title: The One Hundredth
episodes.description: Phoebe is rushed to the hospital, where triplets are born. Joey gets hospitalized next - when his sympathy labor pains turn out to be kidney stones. An unsuspecting Rachel arranges a date for Monica with a male nurse.

episodes.title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
episodes.description: Phoebe resents Joey's PBS telethon gig because of a long-running grudge she holds against the network. To cover up her affair with Chandler, Monica tells Rachel she's dating someone from work.

episodes.title: The One With The Kips
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler go to Atlantic City for a weekend by themselves. Ross tries to tell Rachel they can't be friends once Emily arrives in New York.

episodes.title: The One With The Yeti
episodes.description: While rummaging in the storage room, Monica and Rachel meet a hairy neighbor they first mistake for a yeti. To smooth things over with Emily, Ross agrees to de-Rachelize his apartment.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Moves In
episodes.description: With his marriage on the rocks, Ross moves in with Chandler and Joey. Rachel is convinced that her neighbor Danny is trying to seduce her with mind games.

episodes.title: The One With All The Thanksgivings
episodes.description: The gang reminisces about their worst Thanksgivings. Phoebe's takes her back to 1862. Elaborate tales are spun to try and uncover Monica's worst memory.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Sandwich
episodes.description: Ross is enraged when someone at work steals his Thanksgiving leftovers sandwich. Joey threatens to crack under the strain of knowing about Monica and Chandler's affair.

episodes.title: The One With The Inappropriate Sister
episodes.description: Monica maneuvers Rachel and Danny into dating but Rachel has second thoughts after observing Danny's unusually close relationship with his sister.

episodes.title: The One With All The Resolutions
episodes.description: As the new year approaches, everyone makes resolutions, some more realistic than others. Ross's resolution causes him to wear hot leather pants on a date...perhaps too hot.

episodes.title: The One With Chandler's Work Laugh
episodes.description: Monica uncovers the fake laugh Chandler reserves for his boss's bad jokes. Rachel is upset that Monica hasn't 'fessed up about her affair. Word comes of Emily's remarriage plans.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Bag
episodes.description: When Rachel helps Joey change his image to help him land an acting gig, she includes a shoulder bag that's rather purselike. Phoebe is shocked when her dad attends her grandmother's funeral.

episodes.title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
episodes.description: When Phoebe finds out about the Monica/Chandler affair, she tests Chandler via flirtation. Ugly Naked Guy's apartment goes up for rent and Ross wants it.

episodes.title: The One With The Girl Who Hits Joey
episodes.description: When Joey starts dating Katie, he finds she packs a painful punch. Ross has trouble making friends with his new neighbors.

episodes.title: The One With The Cop
episodes.description: Phoebe finds a police badge inside the Central Perk sofa. Rather than return it, she decides to embark on a "good-deeds" campaign. Joey is unnerved by his romantic dream about Monica.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Inadvertent Kiss
episodes.description: After a job interview, Rachel impulsively kisses her potential boss on the cheek. Joey tries to find a hot girl who lives in Ross' apartment but instead ending up in Ross' apartment. Phoebe and Gary vie for "steamiest-affair" with Monica and Chandler.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Smokes
episodes.description: Rachel takes up smoking at her new job as a way of making inroads with the boss. Ross' son Ben joins Joey on an audition for a soup commerical.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Can't Flirt
episodes.description: Joey's Italian-speaking grandma joins the gang in watching his Law & Order debut. Ross decides to order lots and lots of pizza in order to flirt with the delivery girl.

episodes.title: The One With The Ride-Along
episodes.description: As Emily's wedding nears, the group does its best to distract Ross. A gunshot and a meatball sandwich take center stage when the guys go out on the beat with Phoebe's cop boyfriend.

episodes.title: The One With The Ball
episodes.description: Phoebe asks Chandler to talk Gary out of asking her to move in with him. To fulfill a childhood dream, Rachel buys a sphinx cat which doesn't behave as planned.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Big Break
episodes.description: Joey is excited about landing a lead role in a movie shooting just outside Las Vegas - but furious with Chandler after he confesses his doubts that it will be his "big break." Rachel's right eye is itchy and Monica takes her to the doctor who tells her to take eye drops. But however, Rachel is terrified to take the eye-drops.

episodes.title: The One In Vegas, Part 1
episodes.description: After his film gig falls through, Joey begs Chandler not to visit. But when Monica decides to celebrate her one-year anniversary with Chandler in Vegas, no one wants to be left behind.

episodes.title: The One In Vegas, Part 2
episodes.description: Joey tries to convince a blackjack dealter with identical hands to join him in a business venture. While playing craps with Monica, Chandler makes the bet of a lifetime.

episodes.title: The One After Vegas
episodes.description: A hungover Ross and Rachel are shocked to discover they are husband and wife. Joey and Phoebe have a cross-country adventure.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
episodes.description: When Monica and Chandler tell Rachel that they are moving in together, she mistakenly believes that all three will be roommates. Phoebe discovers that Ross hasn't annulled his marriage to Rachel.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Denial
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler argue about what to do with Rachel's room after she moves out. Ross suggests that Rachel move in with him.

episodes.title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
episodes.description: Joey gets a hernia just as he learns his health insurance has lapsed. When a psychic predicts she'll die within a week, Phoebe plans to make the most of her final days.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Porsche
episodes.description: Joey finds keys to a Porsche and pretends the car is his to impress women. Rachel tries to have her marriage to Ross annulled on the basis of his mental instability.

episodes.title: The One On The Last Night
episodes.description: While boxing up Rachel's belongings, the girls reminisce about their time spent as roommates. Joey's pride forces Chandler to invent a creative way to lend him money.

episodes.title: The One Where Phoebe Runs
episodes.description: Phoebe's unorthodox, attention-getting jogging style embarrasses running mate Rachel. Chandler tries to surprise Monica by cleaning the apartment but forgets where everything goes therefore, seeking help from Ross. Joey's new roommate, a dancer from Australia, moves in with him.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Teeth
episodes.description: Rumor has it that Rachel's boss Ralph Lauren made a romantic pass at Phoebe. Ross has a "bright" idea to impress his date.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Got High
episodes.description: Monica hosts Thanksgiving and Chandler uses the occasion to try and win her parents over. Rachel tests her confused culinary skills on dessert.

episodes.title: The One With The Routine
episodes.description: Joey, Ross and Monica attend a taping of Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve. Joey has special plans for his roommate Janine at the midnight hour.

episodes.title: The One With The Apothecary Table
episodes.description: After double-dating, Joey learns of Janine's dislike for Monica and Chandler. Rachel tries to convince Phoebe that her cute new apothecary table is a priceless antique.

episodes.title: The One With The Joke
episodes.description: When Ross gets a joke printed in Playboy, Chandler claims credit for it. Joey reluctantly takes a job as a waiter at Central Perk.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Sister
episodes.description: When her sister Jill visits, Rachel worries about the sparks that seem to fly between her and Ross. Monica tries to seduce Chandler, despite having the flu.

episodes.title: The One Where Chandler Can't Cry
episodes.description: Rachel forces Ross to cancel his date with her sister. Phoebe discovers she's being mistaken for a porn star. Chandler admits he hasn't been able to cry since he was a child.

episodes.title: The One That Could Have Been, Part 1
episodes.description: The gang ponders what might have been if: Ross had stayed with his lesbian wife; a married Rachel had fallen for Days of Our Lives star Joey; a portly Monica had been obsessed with losing her virginity; Chandler had been a struggling writer; and Phoebe had been a stockbroker.

episodes.title: The One That Could Have Been, Part 2
episodes.description: The gang ponders what might have been if: Ross had stayed with his lesbian wife; a married Rachel had fallen for Days of Our Lives star Joey; a portly Monica had been obsessed with losing her virginity; Chandler had been a struggling writer; and Phoebe had been a stockbroker.

episodes.title: The One With Unagi
episodes.description: Ross tries to teach martial arts to Rachel and Phoebe. Joey hires a look-alike to pose as his twin brother for a medical experiment.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Dates A Student
episodes.description: Ross flirts with danger when he dates an attractive student. After a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe are forced to move in with their friends.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Fridge
episodes.description: When Rachel needs a date for a charity event, Monica and Phoebe compete to find her the best escort. Ross obsesses about his girlfriend spending spring break in Florida. Joey's refrigerator breaks.

episodes.title: The One With Mac And C.H.E.E.S.E.
episodes.description: Joey gets an audition for the lead in a TV show, which sparks memorable and bizarre flashbacks for the gang.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeth's Dad
episodes.description: Ross dreads meeting his college girlfriend's disapproving father. When Joey insults his robot co-star, he jeopardizes his future on the show.

episodes.title: The One Where Paul's The Man
episodes.description: Despite Paul's threats, Ross and Elizabeth secretly head off to her family's mountain cabin. Paul and Rachel have exactly the same plan.

episodes.title: The One With The Ring
episodes.description: Chandler asks Phoebe's help in choosing a ring for Monica. Rachel regrets pushing Paul to express his feelings.

episodes.title: The One With The Proposal, Part 1
episodes.description: The big evening has arrived, but Chandler's romantic plans are ruined when Monica's ex-boyfriend appears. Things sail way off course when Rachel, Phoebe and Joey attend a charity auction. Due to the friends thinking that Ross' relationship with Elizabeth is not going anywhere, he breaks up with her.

episodes.title: The One With The Proposal, Part 2
episodes.description: Rachel and Phoebe arrange "backups". Chandler tries to win Monica back after he fears he ruined things.

episodes.title: The One With Monica's Thunder
episodes.description: Minutes after Chandler proposes to Monica, she plans to celebrate on the town with he pals - until she catches Ross and Rachel kissing.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Book
episodes.description: Monica's dream of elaborate nuptials fizzles when she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Rachel is embarrassed when a teasing Joey stumbles onto her juicy, late-night reading material.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Cookies
episodes.description: Chandler's bonding attempt with his future father-in-law during a close sauna encounter backfires. Monica tries to replicate Phoebe's grandmother's secret cookie recipe by deconstructing her one last cookie.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Assistant
episodes.description: When Rachel is promoted, she gleefully considers hiring an inexperienced hunk as her executive assistant. In a free-for-all tell-all game, Chandler and Monica expose humiliating secrets from each other's pasts.

episodes.title: The One With The Engagement Picture
episodes.description: Unphotogenic Chandler can't get a good photo taken with Monica. Rachel plans to get closer to her hunky assistant by encouraging him to hang out with Joey, but the plan sours when he picks up on Joey's moves.

episodes.title: The One With The Nap Partners
episodes.description: Monica frets when she meets one of Chandler's long-lost girlfriends and learns that he dumped her because she was fat. Phoebe and Rachel vie for the honor of becoming Monica's bridesmaid.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Library Book
episodes.description: When Joey decides to stop dating a girl that Rachel and Phoebe have come to adore, the ladies take action to change his mind. Ross fumes when he discovers the location of his dissertation in the university library.

episodes.title: The One Where Chandler Doesn't Like Dogs
episodes.description: A beaming Rachel is happily surprised when her assistant Tag shows up at the gang's Thanksgiving dinner. Phoebe sneaks a puppy into the apartment, forcing Chandler to confess why he hates dogs.

episodes.title: The One With All The Candy
episodes.description: Monica whips up some holiday candy for the neighbors. Rachel and Tag set the ground rules for their new romance. Moved by Phoebe's bikeless childhood story, Ross buys her a new two-wheeler.

episodes.title: The One With The Holiday Armadillo
episodes.description: Ross wants to introduce son Ben to Hanukkah. In order to entice Rachel to move back into their refurbished apartment, Phoebe must drive a wedge between Rachel and current roomie Joey.

episodes.title: The One With All The Cheesecakes
episodes.description: Phoebe's old flame David visits from Russia for an evening of romance. Rachel and Chandler swipe deliveries of a particularly tasty cheesecake from their neighbor's doorstep.

episodes.title: The One Where They're Up All Night
episodes.description: Rachel and Tag's first night together is put on hold when they realize they forgot to overnight an important package. Ross and Joey are stuck on the roof and Phoebe can't disable a relentlessly beeping smoke alarm. Monica and Chandler cannot get to sleep.

episodes.title: The One Where Rosita Dies
episodes.description: Phoebe has a bizarre first day in her new job when she encounters a distraught office manager in a suicidal mood. Rachel and Chandler both believe they have broken Joey's favorite chair.

episodes.title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
episodes.description: Rachel's agony over her 30th birthday starts everyone reminiscing about what they did upon reaching that milestone.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's New Brain
episodes.description: Joey accidentally lets slip to a Days of Our Lives castmate that she is being written out of the script. Rachel and Phoebe try to sabotage each other's chances to date a guy who left his cell phone at Central Perk.

episodes.title: The One With The Truth About London
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler grudgingly agree to let Joey marry them - once he's been "ordained" via the Internet. While babysitting, Rachel teaches Ben a few practical jokes.

episodes.title: The One With The Cheap Wedding Dress
episodes.description: Monica regrets telling a fellow bride-to-be about a cheaper bridal store when she has to fight her tooth-and-nail for a unique wedding dress - and later the right to hire Chandler's favorite band for the event!

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Award
episodes.description: Joey is overjoyed to be nominated for a "Soapie". Monica gets wedding jitters.

episodes.title: The One With Ross And Monica's Cousin
episodes.description: When Monica and Ross's alluring cousin visits, her irresistible beauty causes serious distractions for all the men who meet her. Rachel and Phoebe try to rush their plans for Monica's shower.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Big Kiss
episodes.description: Rachel bumps into her old sorority sister and wonders whether she should confront her about a night in college when their friendship took a passionate turn.

episodes.title: The One With The Vows
episodes.description: Writing their wedding vows proves a daunting task for Monica and Chandler. Looking back over the pair's relationship, the other friends worry about changes in store for all of them.

episodes.title: The One With Chandler's Dad
episodes.description: Monica arranges a meeting between Chandler and his estranged dad in hopes that they can reconcile before the ceremony. Rachel and a reluctant Ross borrow the keys to Monica's Porsche.

episodes.title: The One With Monica And Chandler's Wedding, Part 1
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler gather their offbeat families on the eve of their wedding but there's one problem: Chandler is missing. While Ross searches for him, Rachel and Phoebe desperately try to distract the unsuspecting bride.

episodes.title: The One With Monica And Chandler's Wedding, Part 2
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler get married. Someone is hiding a big surprise.

episodes.title: The One After "I Do"
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler's wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that someone may be pregnant. Phoebe suspects its Rachel and comes up with a plan to cover for her friend.

episodes.title: The One With The Red Sweater
episodes.description: Monica and Phoebe speculate about who might be the father of Rachel's baby. Mistakenly thinking Phoebe is the one who's pregnant, Joey makes a gallant gesture.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Tells...
episodes.description: Everybody seems to know who the father of Rachel's baby is, except the guy himself: Ross. Phoebe and Joey fib about a gas leak to gain entry to Monica and Chandler's apartment.

episodes.title: The One With The Videotape
episodes.description: Ross and Rachel's attempt to explain how they wound up getting pregnant turns into an argument over who came on to whom - until Ross makes the shocking announcement that he has the encounter on videotape.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Date
episodes.description: Ross is horrified to learn that the pregnant Rachel is headed out on a date with a handsome actor, while Phoebe protests when Monica wants to fire a cute but clumsy sous-chef whom she fancies.

episodes.title: The One With The Halloween Party
episodes.description: At Monica's Halloween party, Phoebe meets her twin sister Ursula's fiance and finds herself attracted to him as well.

episodes.title: The One With The Stain
episodes.description: Ross learns Rachel wants to move out and find her own place... and suggests a vacancy in his building. But Joey gives Ross tough competition when he puts a nursery in their apartment to make her stay.

episodes.title: The One With The Stripper
episodes.description: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a reach bachelor party, Monica arranges for a stripper to perform for him, but Chandler's in for a big surprise.

episodes.title: The One With The Rumor
episodes.description: Monica bumps into an old high school friend and invites him to Thanksgiving dinner with the gang - unaware that he isn't exactly fond of Rachel.

episodes.title: The One With Monica's Boots
episodes.description: Chandler is peeved when Monica splurges on an expensive pair of boots. When Phoebe learns Ross's and Sting's children attend the same school, she angles to meet the celebrity and get concert tickets.

episodes.title: The One With Ross's Step Forward
episodes.description: Ross becomes nervous when Mona wants to mail a joint Christmas card with the couple's picture. As the hormonal effects of her pregnancy kick in, Rachel searches for possible romantic partners - such as Joey.

episodes.title: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel
episodes.description: To prepare Joey for a big date, Rachel goes out with him for a night on the town. But things take an unexpected turn: the date is a success and Joey becomes intensely attracted to Rachel.

episodes.title: The One Where Chandler Takes A Bath
episodes.description: Joey is crazy with guilt over his newfound affection for Rachel - and things get screwier when Monica mistakenly thinks he's infatuated with Phoebe.

episodes.title: The One With The Secret Closet
episodes.description: Chandler becomes obsessed with finding out what is behind the locked door of Monica's forbidden closet. Phoebe feels betrayed when she discovers Monica has been using another massage therapist.

episodes.title: The One With The Birthing Video
episodes.description: Monica goes all out for Valentine's Day with sexy lingerie and X-rated entertainment. But Chandler is too shell-shocked to respond after he accidentally watches a birthing video meant for Rachel.

episodes.title: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel
episodes.description: Joey tells Ross about his true feelings for Rachel. They agree that Joey should tell Rachel during dinner, regardless of the consequences. Chandler fears that Phoebe's new boyfriend Don may be more compatible with Monica than he is.

episodes.title: The One With The Tea Leaves
episodes.description: Phoebe determine through reading tea leaves that she'll soon meet the man of her dreams. Feeling awkward after revealing his true feelings for Rachel, Joey keeps a low profile.

episodes.title: The One In Massapequa
episodes.description: Monica regrets her request to supplant Ross as the designated toast-giver at their parents' 35th wedding anniversary. Phoebe's latest boyfriend drives everyone at the party crazy with his upbeat optimism.

episodes.title: The One With Joey's Interview
episodes.description: Joey is thrilled when his name is used in a Soap Opera Digest crossword. But he's reluctant for them to do a profile of him because his last interview got him into so much trouble he was written out of the show.

episodes.title: The One With The Baby Shower
episodes.description: Rachel panics that she is unprepared to care for a newborn and reluctantly goes along with her mother's plans to move in and help out - which hardly makes roommate Ross jump for joy.

episodes.title: The One With The Cooking Class
episodes.description: Monica's restaurant is hit with a bad review, and she drags Joey along to a class taught by the critic in the hope of changing his mind. While shopping for baby gear, Rachel is put out when a salesgirl flirts with Ross.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
episodes.description: An overdue Rachel will try anything to get the baby moving. Joey is ticked off when Chandler nods off during he screening of his new movie.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Has A Baby, Part 1
episodes.description: Rachel's baby nears delivery with an anxious Ross nearby. While she's in endless labor hell, her waiting friends cause hospital havoc. Chandler and Monica search for privacy in a quest to have their own baby.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Has A Baby, Part 2
episodes.description: Rachel has her baby and names her Emma. Joey finds Ross's ring and Rachel thinks Joey is proposing to her!

episodes.title: The One Where No One Proposes
episodes.description: Due to a misunderstanding, Rachel finds herself engaged to Joey instead of Ross. Things get more confused when Phoebe mistakenly assumes that Ross is the one who proposed.

episodes.title: The One Where Emma Cries
episodes.description: Joey's attempts to gain Ross's forgiveness for mistakenly asking Rachel to marry him only result in emergency hospitalization. A weary Rachel seeks any remedy to quell baby Emma's nonstop crying.

episodes.title: The One With The Pediatrician
episodes.description: Rachel's constant calls to her pediatrician force him to drop Emma as a patient. Ross becomes uncomfortable when Rachel seeks his childhood doctor as a replacement - mainly because he is still Ross's doctor.

episodes.title: The One With The Sharks
episodes.description: Worried she may lose her latest boyfriend, Phoebe's self-doubt is worsened by Ross's foolish comments. Monica mistakenly fears Chandler has an unnatural fetish for sharks.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Birthday Dinner
episodes.description: While Phoebe and Joey await their friends at a fancy restaurant, Rachel frets about leaving Emma with a sitter. Monica and Chandler are also running late due to a heated spat.

episodes.title: The One With The Male Nanny
episodes.description: Rachel's choice of an oversensitive male nanny sparks Ross's mockery. Phoebe must choose between two ardent suitors: new boyfriend Mike or visiting former boyfriend David.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Inappropriate Song
episodes.description: When Chandler's former romantic rival intends to sell his apartment, Chandler and Joey secretly inspect it...and make a shocking discovery. Ross discovers that singing rap is the only way to get baby Emma to laugh.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Other Sister
episodes.description: On the night before Thanksgiving, Rachel's self-centered younger sister Amy ruins everyone's holiday dinner with her uncensored observations.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Phone Number
episodes.description: While out with Phoebe, Rachel impulsively gives a handsome guy her phone number - then worries he'll call when Ross is in. Mike and Ross desperately try finding something to talk about while baby-sitting Emma.

episodes.title: The One With Christmas In Tulsa
episodes.description: Chandler must stay in Tulsa over Christmas due to work deadlines. Monica suspects the worst when she learns that his beautiful co-worker Wendy will join him.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back To Work
episodes.description: Rachel meets her handsome rival Gavin, who has covered her job while she's been on maternity leave. Their immediate war of wills prompts her to make a rash decision that she could regret. Meanwhile, Phoebe works as an extra on Days Of Our Lives

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Rats
episodes.description: Rachel is peeved to learn that Gavin is invited to her birthday party. Ross struggles to keep lascivious Joey away from Emma's beautiful new nanny. Phoebe coaxes Mike into helping care for a litter of baby rats.

episodes.title: The One Where Monica Sings
episodes.description: As Rachel sorts out her feelings for Gavin, Ross recruits Chandler to help him meet attractive women to make her jealous. Monica's see-through dress is a big hit when Phoebe brings her to karaoke night!

episodes.title: The One With The Blind Dates
episodes.description: Joey and Phoebe conspire to arrange awful dates for both Rachel and Ross, hoping that appreciation of their former relationship will cause them to reunite.

episodes.title: The One With The Mugging
episodes.description: To impress a pompous fellow actor during an audition, Joey develops an unusual acting method. Ross is horrified to discover who mugged him when he was a child.

episodes.title: The One With The Boob Job
episodes.description: Phoebe asks Mike to move in with her, but coming so close to married life may spell trouble. The financially strapped Monica and Chandler separately and unknowingly ask Joey for loans.

episodes.title: The One With The Memorial Service
episodes.description: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography of Ross on his college alumni website, Ross retaliates in similar fashion - triggering an Internet war between the two friends.

episodes.title: The One With The Lottery
episodes.description: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their cash and buy dozens of lottery tickets. But bickering over how to spend potential winnings and other disagreements cause a lotto tension.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Dream
episodes.description: Nervous about an upcoming romantic scene, Joey rehearses with Rachel. After watching the show's taping, Rachel has a surprising dream about Joey.

episodes.title: The One With The Soap Opera Party
episodes.description: Ross is excited when his paleontology colleague Charlie is also a stunning beauty. But the excitement fades when she discusses her impressive list of ex-boyfriends at Joey's rooftop party for his Days of Our Lives castmates.

episodes.title: The One With The Fertility Test
episodes.description: Ross is hurt when brilliant Charlie starts dating shallow Joey. However, Joey asks him for advice on how to impress her. Meanwhile, Chandler and Monica have a chance encounter at a fertility clinic.

episodes.title: The One With The Donor
episodes.description: Sad to learn that they cannot conceive naturally, Monica and Chandler mull their options. Chandler brings home a handsome, unknowing co-worker for dinner to "interview" him as a potential sperm donor. After deciding that having a sperm donor is not right for them, they decide to adopt.

episodes.title: The One In Barbados, Part 1
episodes.description: Ross procures free passes for his friends to a paleontologists' convention in Barbados, then scrambles to reconstruct - with Charlie's help - his keynote address after its accidental erasure from his computer. Mike arrives to win Phoebe back.

episodes.title: The One In Barbados, Part 2
episodes.description: Monica and Mike play a heated game of ping pong. Rachel can't hide her feelings for Joey any longer...

episodes.title: The One After Joey And Rachel Kiss
episodes.description: Romantic hookups continue to go astray in Barbados as Monica, Phoebe and Chandler overhear Ross kissing Charlie, while through the room's other wall they can eavesdrop on Joey and Rachel.

episodes.title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
episodes.description: Rachel, Joey and Charlie spend an uncomfortable evening with Ross while Chandler commits an unpardonable act when he and Monica visit a couple who have adopted a cute boy. Phoebe is visited by a desperate Frank Jr., who can't cope with his triplets.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Tan
episodes.description: Rachel and Joey nervously anticipate their first real "night" together. Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an obnoxious old friend who puts on airs and a fake accent. Ross envies Monica's sprayed-on tan and enters the tanning booth, where two-toned disaster strikes.

episodes.title: The One With The Cake
episodes.description: Rachel convinces Monica to delay a long anticipated trip to Vermont. But complications ensue when an X-rated birthday cake arrives.

episodes.title: The One Where Rachel's Sister Baby-Sits
episodes.description: Rachel convinces spoiled sister Amy to baby-sit Emma over Ross's protests. Phoebe unknowingly thwarts Mike's surprise for her. Joey scares Monica and Chandler with a recommendation letter on their behalf to a child adoption agency.

episodes.title: The One With Ross' Grant
episodes.description: Ross interviews with a Nobel Prize-winning scientist for a paleontology grant - but the doctor is Charlie's ex-boyfriend, who offers Ross the grant only if he breaks up with her. Phoebe sends Monica and Rachel screaming with her artistic creation of "Gladys".

episodes.title: The One With The Home Study
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler meet with an adoption worker who will decide if they're suitable parents - and who confesses that she was once romanced by a cad named Joey in the same building.

episodes.title: The One With The Late Thanksgiving
episodes.description: Monica prepares a Thanksgiving feast and is furious when no one shows up! When Joey gets stuck in the door, Monica and Chandler have the ideal remedy. Phoebe convinces Rachel to enroll Emma in a baby beauty contest.

episodes.title: The One With The Birth Mother
episodes.description: Monica and Chandler travel to Texas to meet a young pregnant woman who is considering allowing them to adopt her child when it's born. Joey dates Phoebe's friend but annoys her with his territorial eating habits.

episodes.title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
episodes.description: When Phoebe and Rachel see Chandler getting into a car with a pretty woman, they suspect the worst. When they tell Monica, they learn the woman is a real estate agent - and that the couple's been house-hunting outside Manhattan.

episodes.title: The One Where The Stripper Cries
episodes.description: Joey is a celebrity guest on Pyramid. When Monica and Rachel throw a "mature" bachelorette party for Phoebe, they're forced to hire a stripper at the last minute. Chandler and Ross attend their college reunion, where they learn a 1987 dating pact was broken.

episodes.title: The One With Phoebe's Wedding
episodes.description: Monica's hard-nosed wedding-planner techniques cause Phoebe to fire her. The big day turns chaotic when a blizzard forces a change in plans.

episodes.title: The One Where Joey Speaks French
episodes.description: When Phoebe tries teaching Joey to speak French for an audition and fails, she convinces the casting director Joey is retarded. Ross turns down Rachel's request for sympathy sex after her father has a heart attack.

episodes.title: The One With Princess Consuela
episodes.description: Rachel is fired from her job the same day Ross learns that he has gotten tenure. When Phoebe legally changes her name, Mike does so too to teacher her a lesson. Joey goes with Chandler and Monica to check out their new home.

episodes.title: The One Where Estelle Dies
episodes.description: Phoebe tries to protect Joey from the news that his agent Estelle has died. Monica and Chandler check out the house next door to theirs - and discover that Chandler's ex-girlfriend Janice is interested in buying it.

episodes.title: The One With Rachel's Going Away Party
episodes.description: Ross goes berserk when Rachel decides that Monica's farewell party is the perfect time to share a private, tearful goodbye with each friend - with the single exception of Ross!

episodes.title: The Last One, Part 1
episodes.description: Set to embark on the next chapters in their lives, the six friends spend their last day together, and it's one of the momentous events, major decisions about personal futures and last-minute surprises. Part 1 of 2.

episodes.title: The Last One, Part 2
episodes.description: Set to embark on the next chapters in their lives, the six friends spend their last day together, and it's one of the momentous events, major decisions about personal futures and last-minute surprises. Part 2 of 2.
